1.name: Vinyl Sticker
1.description: Durable and weather-resistant, perfect for outdoor use.

2.name: Die-Cut Sticker
2.description: Custom-made to fit the shape of your design, offering a unique look.

3.name: Bumper Sticker
3.description: Designed for cars, durable and long-lasting.

4.name: Holographic Sticker
4.description: Reflects light in various colors, creating a shimmering effect.

5.name: Thermo Sticker
5.description: Changes color in response to temperature shifts.

6.name: Barcode Sticker
6.description: Essential for retail and inventory management.

7.name: Doming Sticker
7.description: Coated with a clear resin layer for a three-dimensional appearance.

8.name: Foil Sticker
8.description: Made with a thin metallic layer, perfect for high-end product labels.

9.name: Paper Sticker
9.description: Cost-effective and versatile, great for indoor use.

10.name: Static Cling Sticker
10.description: Adheres to surfaces without adhesive, perfect for temporary use.

11.name: Puffy Sticker
11.description: Soft and raised, adds a playful touch to any surface.

12.name: Kiss-Cut Sticker
12.description: Cut through the vinyl but not the backing, easy to peel.

13.name: Wall Decal
13.description: Large stickers designed to adhere to walls, perfect for home decoration.

14.name: Eco-Friendly Sticker
14.description: Made from sustainable materials, environmentally friendly.

15.name: Glow-in-the-Dark Sticker
15.description: Glows in the dark, perfect for nighttime visibility.
